description: Lincoln House / Suffolk House FRONT GARDENs : T1 = Small Sorbus - Remove deadwood T2 = Medium Conifer - Has been quoted for ( ref 024859) T3 = Small Magnolia - No works required. T4 = Small Sorbus - Remove deadwood T5 = Medium Portuguese Laurel - Overall crown reduction 1 -2 metres and reshape . T6 = Small Portuguese Laurel - Overall crown reduction 1-2 metres and reshape T7 = Small Malus - Crown thin 20% T8 = Small Sorbus - Remove deadwood and cut back from building to give at least 1 metre clearance. T9 = Small Portuguese Laurel - Overall crown reduction 1-2 metres and reshape. T10 = Medium Bay - No works required. REAR GARDENs: G1 = Overgrown vegetation located in neighbour garden heavily overhanging - Cut back overhang to boundary. T11 = Large Sycamore located in neighbour garden heavily overhanging Lincoln and Suffolk house - Cut back from property to give at least 2 metre clearance. T12 = Large Ash overgrown blocking out light - Overall crown reduction 2- 3 metres and reshape. G2 = Medium Bush - Cut back from building to give a 1.5 metre clearance.
